sentences.en: A 10 percent service charge is added in lieu of tipping.
sentences.cn: 加收了10%的服务费以代替小费。

sentences.en: Ce jardin est le lieu de rencontre privil é gi é des promeneurs.
sentences.cn: 这个花园是散步的人经常碰头的地方.

sentences.en: Childrem watched TV in lieu of doing their home work.
sentences.cn: 孩子们观看了电视代替做他们的作业.

sentences.en: Enclosed is our new Quotation No. ______ in lieu of the previous one.
sentences.cn: 随附我公司第号新的报价单以替代前发的报价单.

sentences.en: extra time off in lieu of payment
He left what little furniture he owned to his landlord in lieu of rent.
sentences.cn: 他把自己仅有的那点家具留给了房东抵房租。

sentences.en: He used an inked thumbprint in lieu of signature.
He worked on Sunday, so he took Monday off in lieu.
sentences.cn: 他星期天工作了, 所以代之以星期一休息.

sentences.en: In lieu of a reply, Hung - chien took her hand.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 拉她手代替回答.

sentences.en: In lieu of carrying an umbrella, I wore a waterproof coat and cap.
sentences.cn: 我穿一件雨衣,戴一顶雨帽,就不用带雨伞了.

sentences.en: John Deere engine accessories and Donaldson Filters in lieu of sales.
sentences.cn: 约翰迪尔发动机配件及唐纳森滤清器的代销售.

sentences.en: Jou - chia took his hand in lieu of a reply.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉 拉他手代替回答.

sentences.en: She used an inked thumbprint in lieu of signature.
Some kiosks make use of hardware buttons mapped to onscreen functions in lieu of touch screens.
sentences.cn: 有些信息亭用硬按键来对应屏幕上的功能,以此取代触摸屏.

sentences.en: The company offered us time off in lieu.
sentences.cn: 公司叫我们用休假来代替.

sentences.en: We give him three month'wages in lieu of notice.
sentences.cn: 我们给了他三个月的工资而来向他发离职通知.
